meanings.definition: The concentration of osmoles in a solution.
meanings.sent1: The osmolarities of the solution were carefully measured in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study osmolarities to understand the strength of a solution.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the highest osmolarities in the experiment was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of osmolarities was a beacon of light in the murky sea of solutions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to explain osmolarities to the students.

meanings.definition: The measure of the number of osmoles of solute per liter of solution.
meanings.sent1: The osmolarities of the solute were calculated for accurate results.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use osmolarities to determine the concentration of a solution.
meanings.sent3: The party invitation requested guests to bring their favorite osmolarities.
meanings.sent4: In the world of solutions, osmolarities were the stars shining bright.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained osmolarities with colorful illustrations.

meanings.definition: The total number of osmoles of solute particles per liter of solution.
meanings.sent1: The osmolarities of the particles were crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Researchers compared the osmolarities of different solutions for their study.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret recipe included a dash of unexpected osmolarities.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, osmolarities danced like tiny particles in a solution.
meanings.sent5: The student conducted an experiment to visualize osmolarities in action.
